title: Conduct Physical Due Diligence on an Apartment Building
description: A buyer's agent must coordinate physical inspections for a 100-unit apartment building under contract.

tasks.description: Hire and schedule third-party inspectors for structural, mechanical (HVAC), and environmental assessments.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary third-party inspections are scheduled.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the property manager to provide access to all units and mechanical rooms for the inspectors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Inspectors are given full access to the property as needed.

tasks.description: Review all inspection reports to identify major capital expenditures needed in the near future.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a summary of required repairs and estimated costs for the buyer.
